name: Sharpedo
author: Yumi
flavor_text: It has a sad history. In the past, its dorsal fin was a treasured foodstuff, so this Pokémon became a victim of overfishing.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aqua Impact
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each {C} in your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost.
